author: makortel
body:
This PR is a follow-up to #25577:
* Remove `L1Trigger/Configuration/python/customise_ReEmulateL1_cff.py` as obsolete (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25577#issuecomment-459663575)
* Replace remaining `isChosen()` calls with `toModify()` for the printouts
  * Feels a bit of a misuse, but works
* Some miscellaneous typo fixes

Tested in CMSSW_10_5_X_2019-02-10-2300, no changes expected.
title: Remove last Modifier.isChosen() calls from L1T configuration
